definitions: (in gambling) an independent party with whom each of those who make a wager deposits the money or counters wagered.
shortDefinitions: (in gambling) independent party with whom each of those who make wager deposits money or counters wagered

definitions: a person with an interest or concern in something, especially a business.
shortDefinitions: person with interest or concern in something

definitions: denoting a type of organization or system in which all the members or participants are seen as having an interest in its success
shortDefinitions: denoting type of organization or system in which all members or participants are seen as having interest in its success
